Affordable Tax Relief proudly announces its distinguished recognition as the sole Category 4 recipient of the Better Business Bureau (BBB) International Torch Awards for Ethics, underscoring the company’s unwavering commitment to ethical business practices. This accolade is a testament to the company’s dedication to excellence, integrity, and transparency in the tax resolution industry.

The BBB International Torch Awards for Ethics is a prestigious honor bestowed upon businesses that exemplify the highest standards of ethics and integrity. The award is divided into four categories with a single recipient for each: Category 1 (1-10 employees), Category 2 (11-99 employees), Category 3 (100-499 employees), and Category 4 (500+ employees). Affordable was awarded the International Torch Award amongst 1,000 BBB regional winners from Canada, Mexico, and the U.S. that were automatically entered into the competition.

Conferred each year since 1996, the International Torch Awards for Ethics recognize companies whose leadership centers on four C’s: evaluating the Character of the organization’s leadership, fostering an authentic Culture, maintaining a transparent relationship with Customers, and assessing the impact the organization is making in the local Community. Affordable Tax Relief’s commitment to maintaining these principles has set the company apart and positioned it as a leader in the industry.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

This international honor comes after Affordable Tax Relief’s BBB Torch Award for Ethics in 2021 and 2017. David King, CEO of Affordable Tax Relief, expressed his gratitude for the award, stating, “Receiving the BBB International Torch Awards for Ethics is a significant achievement and a reflection of the values that guide Affordable. Our hope has always been to set the example of what a tax “relief” company should be, and this award assures us we are on the right track.”

Christine Bui, Chief Customer Officer of Affordable Tax Relief, echoed King’s sentiments, stating, “Ethics and compliance are at the core of our company culture. We believe in doing what is right for our clients and maintaining the trust they place in us. Receiving the BBB International Torch Awards for Ethics is a tremendous honor and reinforces our commitment to ethical business practices.”

The virtual award ceremony took place on November 16, 2023, at the BBB’s inaugural Trust Summit, where Affordable Tax Relief was celebrated for their commitment to ethical excellence.

To read more about the BBB International Torch Awards for Ethics visit:

https://www.bbb.org/article/news-releases/29537-iabbb-international-torch-awards-for-ethics-companies-honored-for-ethical-business-practices
